title: Crossing Bridges: Big Coal River Rising
description: Quincy Ashford enlists in the Army to serve his country and is sent to Vietnam, where his strength of character and leadership enable him to lead, survive and return home. He returns to his West Virginia home and arrives simultaneously as Mother Nature delivers more hardship to the people of Big Coal River. Quincy must fight to save his family, friends, and his home. The people you grew to love in Crossing Big Coal River prove worthy of your love in Crossing Bridges - Big Coal River Rising.
author: Ryan   Hale
